title: Hasbro CEO Brian Goldner Takes Medical Leave, Effective Immediately
sub_head: Executive was treated for prostate cancer in 2014
body:
Hasbro Inc. Chief Executive Brian Goldner will take a leave of absence for medical care.
The global toy, game and entertainment company didn’t specify the medical condition but pointed to Mr. Goldner’s disclosure in August 2020 that he was undergoing continued treatment that might cause hair loss. He was treated for prostate cancer in 2014.
